ModalNews.Title: Warning!
ModalNews.MarkdownText:
This game is not complete and you could lose information in some update. 

 You can now save your data by logging in with a **Google account**! 

 GmAi is free, but it is limited in the number of players it can serve per minute. If GmAi is not working as expected, try playing at a less busy time. Premium accounts will be required to remove this limitation, we are evaluating the best options. 

 To report a bug or make a suggestion you can write to me at [**alfonso.ar**](https://alfonso.ar). 

 #### **COMING SOON** 

 The following are ideas to improve this app in the future. 

 * ~~Cooperative multiplayer with GmAi.~~ 

 * Generation of the character's avatar with GmAi. 

 * Generation of video based on a book with GmAi.

ModaIdeasForAI.title: Tips and shortcuts
ModaIdeasForAI.p1: These are tips and shortcuts to help you improve your experience with Game Master AI.
ModaIdeasForAI.p2: * You can only use them within the game.

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1_p_strong: The story ends after 3 failures or 5 successes.
tips.tip1_p: If you don't want it to end quickly, you can write down your test results or ask GmAi to do them for you. That way they won't be saved in the system and you'll prevent the ending from being triggered. Although GmAi can conclude on its own, you can ask it to continue as long as you like.
tips.tip2_p_strong: XP earned at the end of the story
tips.tip2_p: It is calculated based on the outcome of your characteristic tests. Only the tests launched from your character sheets count, since they are registered in the system. GmAI keeps its own record, but it's not very reliable.
tips.tip3_p: It's easy, bring ideas to the plot creatively and not just by choosing the options that GmAi gives you.
tips.tip4_p: It is possible, ask your GmAi to "perform characteristic tests", that will motivate him to give you more tests and details to advance faster in the story. If GmAi rolls for you, you can tell it that you want to do all the rolls.
tips.tip5_p_strong: Want to play a campaign of multiple stories?
tips.tip5_p: Save your story to the library. Then you can access it and continue playing from where you left off.

tips_Multiplayer.tip1_p: GmAi only interprets messages sent in-game, in character. Out-of-game messages are sent in the player's name and are less visible. Use out-of-game messages to coordinate the story with your teammates.
tips_Multiplayer.tip2_p_strong: XP earned at the end of the story
tips_Multiplayer.tip2_p: When you exit the game, your character will receive the appropriate XP. XP is calculated based on the results of all tests performed from all character tokens. All participants earn the same amount of XP. The number of tests and the quality of the tests determines the final result of XP earned. You will not earn XP if the story is not formally finished by the host of the game (see below).
tips_Multiplayer.tip3_p: It's easy, contribute ideas to the plot creatively and not just by choosing the options given by GmAi.
tips_Multiplayer.tip4_p: Any player can ask in-game to end the story. But only the host can formally end the story. If the story does not formally end, you will not gain XP when you exit the game.
tips_Multiplayer.tip5_p_strong: Want to play a campaign of multiple stories?
tips_Multiplayer.tip5_p: Save your story in the library. Then you can access it and continue playing from where you left off. GmAi will create a summary of the story. Use that summary to create a new story.
